<p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span style="font-size:15.0pt;

微软雅黑;color:#303030;mso-font-kerning:0pt">野指针不是<span lang="EN-US">NULL</span>指针，而是指向‘垃圾’内存的指针。一般不会用错空指针，因为<span lang="EN-US">if</span>语句就可以判断，但是野指针是没法判断的，所以很危险。 <span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span style="font-size:15.0pt;
font-family:"微软雅黑",sans-serif;mso-hansi-font-family:Courier;mso-bidi-font-family:
微软雅黑;color:#303030;mso-font-kerning:0pt">野指针的成因有两种：<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="margin-left: 36pt; text-indent: -36pt;"><!--[if !supportLists]--><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:15.0pt;font-family:"微软雅黑",sans-serif;mso-fareast-font-family:
Courier;mso-hansi-font-family:Courier;mso-bidi-font-family:Courier;color:#303030;
mso-font-kerning:0pt">•<span style="font-size: 7pt; line-height: normal; font-family: 'Times New Roman';">
</span></span><!--[endif]--><span style="font-size:15.0pt;font-family:"微软雅黑",sans-serif;
mso-hansi-font-family:Courier;mso-bidi-font-family:微软雅黑;color:#303030;
mso-font-kerning:0pt">指针变量没有初始化，任何指针变量在刚刚被创建时是不会被自动成为<span lang="EN-US">NULL</span>指针，他的缺省值是随机的。<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="margin-left: 36pt; text-indent: -36pt;"><!--[if !supportLists]--><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:15.0pt;font-family:"微软雅黑",sans-serif;mso-fareast-font-family:

mso-hansi-font-family:Courier;mso-bidi-font-family:微软雅黑;color:#303030;
mso-font-kerning:0pt">指针被<span lang="EN-US"> free / delete</span>之后没有被设置为空。如果程序太大，自己都可能搞不清楚是不是合法的指针。注意：<span lang="EN-US">free/delete</span>仅仅是释放内存，并不会过问指针有没有置为<span lang="EN-US">NULL</span>的事。<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

微软雅黑;mso-bidi-font-family:Courier;color:#262626;mso-font-kerning:.5pt">   </span><span style="color: rgb(48, 48, 48); font-family: 微软雅黑, sans-serif; font-size: 15pt; text-indent: -36pt;">函数中申请的这块内存释放了没？</span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span style="font-size:15.0pt;
font-family:"微软雅黑",sans-serif;mso-hansi-font-family:Courier;mso-bidi-font-family:
微软雅黑;color:#303030;mso-font-kerning:0pt">答案是没有。有人可能会想到，在函数退出时<span lang="EN-US">p</span>指针变量已经消亡了，为什内存没有释放？其实道理很简单。变量就是个容器。容器是没有，并不代表申请的东西也没了！所以要注意指针的以下特征：<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="margin-left: 36pt; text-indent: -36pt;"><!--[if !supportLists]--><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:15.0pt;font-family:"微软雅黑",sans-serif;mso-fareast-font-family:
Courier;mso-hansi-font-family:Courier;mso-bidi-font-family:Courier;color:#303030;
mso-font-kerning:0pt">•<span style="font-size: 7pt; line-height: normal; font-family: 'Times New Roman';">
</span></span><!--[endif]--><span style="font-size:15.0pt;font-family:"微软雅黑",sans-serif;
mso-hansi-font-family:Courier;mso-bidi-font-family:微软雅黑;color:#303030;
mso-font-kerning:0pt">指针消亡了，不代表它指向的内存会被自动释放（内存泄漏）<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="margin-left: 36pt; text-indent: -36pt;"><!--[if !supportLists]--><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:15.0pt;font-family:"微软雅黑",sans-serif;mso-fareast-font-family:
Courier;mso-hansi-font-family:Courier;mso-bidi-font-family:Courier;color:#303030;
mso-font-kerning:0pt">•<span style="font-size: 7pt; line-height: normal; font-family: 'Times New Roman';">
</span></span><!--[endif]--><span style="font-size:15.0pt;font-family:"微软雅黑",sans-serif;
mso-hansi-font-family:Courier;mso-bidi-font-family:微软雅黑;color:#303030;
mso-font-kerning:0pt">内存被释放了，不代表指针会消亡或者成为<span lang="EN-US">NULL</span>指针（野指针）<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="margin-left: 36pt; text-indent: -36pt;"><!--[if !supportLists]--><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:15.0pt;font-family:"微软雅黑",sans-serif;mso-fareast-font-family:

mso-font-kerning:0pt">指针 与 内存 并不可以直接画等号。<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="margin-left: 36pt; text-indent: -36pt;"><!--[if !supportLists]--><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:15.0pt;font-family:"微软雅黑",sans-serif;mso-fareast-font-family:

</span></span><!--[endif]--><span style="font-size:15.0pt;font-family:"微软雅黑",sans-serif;
mso-hansi-font-family:Courier;mso-bidi-font-family:微软雅黑;color:#303030;
mso-font-kerning:0pt">指针本质上只是变量，不过他的作用是来管理内存！<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="margin-left: 36pt; text-indent: -36pt;"><!--[if !supportLists]--><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:15.0pt;font-family:"微软雅黑",sans-serif;mso-fareast-font-family:

mso-font-kerning:0pt">•<span style="font-size: 7pt; line-height: normal; font-family: 'Times New Roman';">
</span></span><!--[endif]--><span style="font-size:15.0pt;font-family:"微软雅黑",sans-serif;
mso-hansi-font-family:Courier;mso-bidi-font-family:微软雅黑;color:#303030;
mso-font-kerning:0pt">指针仅仅是对内存的一个索引，内存不管发生什么事（比如释放），指针都没法得知，必须手动去改变指针（比如在释放内存后置空指针）。<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>
